controller

Interface SimulationState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicSimulationState

    public interface SimulationState
    This interface represents a PPAL simulation state.

    • Method Detail

      • insertSociety

        void insertSociety(Society society)
            throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Inserts a society in the simulation.
        Parameters:
        society - A society.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - When a society is already inserted.

      • removeSociety

        Removes a society from the simulation.
        Parameters:

      • getSocieties

        java.util.Set<Society> getSocieties()
        Get all societies in the simulation.
        Returns:
        A Set of societies.

      • getSociety

        Society getSociety(java.lang.String id)
        Fetches a society by it's id.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the society to fetch.
        Returns:
        A society with the given id, or null if no such society exists.
